revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sky Pillar |image = [[File:Sky Pillar.png|250px]] |caption = An outside view of Sky Pillar. |tokens = 40,000 |location = Southwest of Sootopolis City, north of Route 131. }} '''Sky Pillar''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 420,000 |- | Dusclops (Boss) || 1,200,000 |- | Rayquaza (Boss) || 1,824,002 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Sableye * Claydol * Banette * Mawile * Altaria * Dusclops (boss) * Rayquaza (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
